android.permission.REVOKE_RUNTIME_PERMIS.description: This permission allows the app to revoke runtime permissions.

android.permission.SCHEDULE_EXACT_ALARM.description: This permission allows the app to schedule precise alarms, affecting battery life.

android.permission.SEND_RESPOND_VIA_MESS.description: This permission allows the app to send messages using the respond-via-message action.

android.permission.SEND_SMS.description: This permission allows the app to send SMS messages.

android.permission.SEND_SMS_NO_CONFIRMAT.description: This permission allows the app to send SMS messages without user confirmation.

android.permission.SERIAL_PORT.description: This permission allows the app to access serial ports.

android.permission.SET_ACTIVITY_WATCHER.description: This permission allows the app to monitor and control how activities are started globally in the system.

android.permission.SET_ALARM.description: This permission allows the app to broadcast an Intent to set an alarm for the user.

android.permission.SET_ALWAYS_FINISH.description: This permission allows the app to control whether activities are immediately finished when put in the background.

android.permission.SET_ANIMATION_SCALE.description: This permission allows the app to modify the global animation scaling factor.

android.permission.SET_DEBUG_APP.description: This permission allows the app to turn on debugging for another app.

android.permission.SET_DEFAULT_VOICE.description: This permission allows the app to set the default voice for speech synthesis.

android.permission.SET_PREFERRED_APPLICA.description: This permission allows the app to modify your preferred apps.

android.permission.SET_PROCESS_LIMIT.description: This permission allows the app to set the maximum number of processes that can run.

android.permission.SET_TIME.description: This permission allows the app to set the system time.

android.permission.SET_TIME_ZONE.description: This permission allows the app to change the phone's time zone.

android.permission.SET_VOLUME_KEY_LONG_P.description: This permission allows the app to set a listener to be called when the volume up or volume down key is long-pressed.

android.permission.SET_WALLPAPER.description: This permission allows the app to set the system wallpaper.

android.permission.SET_WALLPAPER_COMPONE.description: This permission allows the app to specify a different component to use as the wallpaper.

android.permission.SET_WALLPAPER_HINTS.description: This permission allows the app to set wallpaper size hints.

android.permission.SIGNAL_PERSISTENT_PRO.description: This permission allows the app to request that signal be sent to all persistent processes.

android.permission.START_ACTIVITIES_FROM.description: This permission allows the app to start activities from the background.

android.permission.START_TASKS_FROM_RECE.description: This permission allows the app to start tasks from the recent task list.

android.permission.STOP_APP_SWITCHES.description: This permission allows the app to prevent the user from switching to another app.

android.permission.STORAGE_INTERNAL.description: This permission allows the app to read and write the system's internal storage.

android.permission.SUSPEND_APPS.description: This permission allows the app to suspend other apps.

android.permission.SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW.description: This permission allows an app to create windows, shown on top of all other apps.

android.permission.TEMPORARY_ENABLE_ACCE.description: This permission allows the app to temporarily enable accessibility features.

android.permission.TRANSMIT_IR.description: This permission allows the app to use the device's infrared transmitter.

android.permission.TRUST_LISTENER.description: This permission allows the app to be informed of changes in trust for the device.

android.permission.TV_INPUT_HARDWARE.description: This permission allows the app to access TV input hardware.

android.permission.TV_VIRTUAL_REMOTE_CON.description: This permission allows the app to interact with a virtual remote controller for a television.

android.permission.UNINSTALL_SHORTCUT.description: This permission allows the app to uninstall a shortcut from the launcher.

android.permission.UPDATE_APP_OPS_STATS.description: This permission allows the app to update or delete the usage statistics for operations.

android.permission.UPDATE_DEVICE_STATS.description: This permission allows the app to update device statistics.

android.permission.UPDATE_LOCK.description: This permission allows the app to control the lock screen update.

android.permission.UPDATE_LOCK_TASK_PACK.description: This permission allows the app to update the list of packages that are allowed to run in lock task mode.

android.permission.USE_BIOMETRIC.description: This permission allows the app to use device's biometric hardware.

android.permission.USE_CREDENTIALS.description: This permission allows the app to request authentication tokens.

android.permission.USE_FINGERPRINT.description: This permission allows the app to use the fingerprint hardware.

android.permission.USE_FULL_SCREEN_INTEN.description: This permission allows the app to use full-screen intents.

android.permission.USE_ICC_AUTH_WITH_DEV.description: This permission allows the app to perform ICC authentication using the device's identifiers.

android.permission.USE_SIP.description: This permission allows the app to use the SIP service to make/receive internet calls.

android.permission.USER_ACTIVITY.description: This permission allows the app to report user activity.

android.permission.VIBRATE.description: This permission allows the app to control the vibrator.

android.permission.VIEW_INSTANT_APPS.description: This permission allows the app to view information about the currently running instant apps.

android.permission.VISUAL_VOICEMAIL.description: This permission allows the app to access and interact with visual voicemail data.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: This permission allows using the PowerManager's WakeLocks to keep processor from sleeping or screen from dimming.

android.permission.WRITE_APN_SETTINGS.description: This permission allows applications to write the apn settings.

android.permission.WRITE_CALENDAR.description: This permission allows an application to write to the user's calendar data.

android.permission.WRITE_CALL_LOG.description: This permission allows an application to write (but not read) the user's call log data.

android.permission.WRITE_CONTACTS.description: This permission allows an application to write to the user's contacts data.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.description: This permission allows an application to write to external storage.

android.permission.WRITE_GSERVICES.description: This permission allows an application to modify the Google services map.

android.permission.WRITE_MEDIA_STORAGE.description: This permission allows an application to write to external media storage.

android.permission.WRITE_PROFILE.description: This permission allows an application to write (but not read) the user's personal profile data.

android.permission.WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS.description: This permission allows an application to read or write the secure system settings.

android.permission.WRITE_SETTINGS.description: This permission allows an application to read or write the system settings.

android.permission.WRITE_SMS.description: This permission allows an application to write SMS messages.

android.permission.WRITE_SOCIAL_STREAM.description: This permission allows an application to write (but not read) the user's social stream data.

android.permission.WRITE_SYNC_SETTINGS.description: This permission allows an application to write the sync settings.

android.permission.WRITE_USER_DICTIONARY.description: This permission allows an application to write to the user's dictionary.
